pkgmetadata.longdescription: # news_2_pdfGenerate international news in pdf. For people with limited access to internet.## usage```import news_2_pdfnew_2_pdf.gen('bbc英文')new_2_pdf.gen('nyt英文')new_2_pdf.gen('bbc')new_2_pdf.gen('nyt')```## how to install`sudo -v && wget -nv -O- https://download.calibre-ebook.com/linux-installer.sh | sudo sh /dev/stdin` `pip3 install news_2_pdf`
